title: Colombian Emerald Birthstone - 1 Carat
description: This exquisite 1 carat Colombian emerald birthstone is a stunning example of the rich green hue that has made emeralds so highly prized throughout history. Mined from the renowned Colombian deposits, this gemstone embodies the essence of renewal and prosperity. The emerald is meticulously cut to enhance its natural brilliance and is polished to a high shine. Its vibrant color and clarity make it an ideal choice for a variety of jewelry pieces, from rings to pendants. As the birthstone for May, it is a meaningful gift that symbolizes love, rebirth, and fertility. This emerald's timeless beauty and elegance will be cherished for generations to come, making it a valuable addition to any gemstone collection.
meta_title: Colombian Emerald Birthstone - 1 Carat | Gem Select
meta_description: Discover the vibrant green Colombian emerald birthstone, perfect for May birthdays. This 1 carat gemstone is expertly cut and polished to enhance its natural beauty.

title: Colombian Emerald Birthstone - 2 Carat
description: This magnificent 2 carat Colombian emerald birthstone showcases the deep green color and exceptional clarity that emeralds from this region are known for. Sourced from the finest mines in Colombia, this gemstone represents the pinnacle of natural beauty and expert craftsmanship. The emerald is carefully cut to maximize its brilliance and is polished to reveal its stunning depth of color. Perfect for creating standout jewelry pieces, this emerald is a symbol of rebirth, fertility, and love, making it a meaningful gift for those born in May. Its timeless elegance ensures that it will be treasured for generations, adding a touch of luxury to any collection.
meta_title: Colombian Emerald Birthstone - 2 Carat | Gem Select
meta_description: Explore the exquisite 2 carat Colombian emerald birthstone, ideal for May birthdays. This gemstone is known for its deep green color and exceptional clarity.
